title: 🎆 30,000 Pixel 4th of July Light Show | “God Bless the USA” Armed Forces Tribute 🎆
description:
This is one of my custom song sequences from my 2025 Fourth of July light show, featuring over 30,000 programmable RGB pixel LED lights synchronized to music.

My show also includes five custom-made LED pixel fireworks, built at different heights and sizes to create a stunning firework effect in lights. Everything is broadcast through an FM transmitter, so visitors can enjoy the music from their vehicles by tuning in to 89.1 FM.

This sequence is set to “God Bless the USA” with a special tribute to the U.S. Armed Forces 🇺🇸.

✨ Thank you for watching and supporting my work!

👉 Don’t forget to like, comment, and subscribe for more holiday light shows and DIY projects.

Hashtags:

#July4th #IndependenceDay #LightShow #LEDLightShow #PatrioticLights #GodBlessTheUSA #Tribute #USArmedForces #HolidayLights #RGBPixels #LEDFireworks

tags: God Bless the USA light show

title: 🙏 My amazing friends and family jumped in to help me customize plug-and-play heads 💜
🎉 GREAT NEWS! 🎉 Look what finally arrived… the Hauntley’s Heads are HERE!￼￼
My baby stroller conversion is almost done! I have a couple more surprises to add to it.
👻 Doom Buggy DIY with my Grandson! ✨👻
✨ I still can’t believe this actually happened. ✨
description:
A few months ago, I built a Madame Leota crystal ball replica in my garage—and the video went viral. People from all over the world reached out asking how I made it, and even if I’d build one for them.

But nothing could’ve prepared me for what happened next…

Bob Gurr—yes, the Disney Legend who designed the Doom Buggy for Disneyland’s Haunted Mansion—saw my video and reached out to me personally. He asked if I’d be willing to build a version of my Madame Leota prop for him to display in his studio.

This is the moment that changed everything.

Yesterday, my wife, my daughter, and I drove to his studio in Orange, California, and hand-delivered the upgraded version I built just for him. This was a special edition piece, with details and improvements I’ve never included before.

Seeing the smile on Bob’s face… hearing his kind words… watching my daughter witness that moment—it was emotional, surreal, and incredibly humbling.

This wasn’t just a prop delivery.

It was a full-circle moment, a love letter to the Haunted Mansion, and a dream come true for me as a lifelong Disney fan and maker.

From my garage… to a Disney Legend’s studio.

Thank you, Bob. For the magic you’ve given the world—and for believing in mine. 🖤👻

#MadameLeota

#BobGurr

#HauntedMansion

#DisneyLegend

#PropMaker

#DIYMagic

#Imagineering

#HauntedMansionFans

#WaltDisneyLegacy

#DoomBuggy

#DisneyProps

#HauntedHandoff

#DreamsComeTrue

title: I Created This Special Edition Madame Leota Inspired Crystal Ball Replica For A Disney Legend!
description:
This still doesn’t feel real. The Legendary Bob Gurr, the man Walt Disney personally hired and the designer of the Haunted Mansion Doom Buggy, asked me to build him my Madame Leota Inspired Crystal Ball Replica to Display in his studio in Orange, California. I am delivering it to him Friday — my wife and daughter are coming with me. We’re documenting everything.

✨ This is for the fans. This is for the dreamers. 

#MadameLeota #HauntedMansion #BobGurr #DisneyLegend #Imagineering #disney #disneyland #diylightguy #disneyimagineering #disneyhauntedmansion

title: 🎆 How I Built My Kraken Rigid Fireworks Stars from Mattos Designs 🎆
description:
I’ve received a ton of questions about the Kraken Rigid Fireworks Stars I set up from Mattos Designs — so I decided to put together this step-by-step video showing exactly how I built and installed them for my Fourth of July light show!

In this video, I’ll walk you through:

How I assembled the Kraken rigid fireworks system

How I mounted the hub to a 1” threaded pipe using a 1” threaded pipe cap with a drilled hole to match the bolt size

The type of poles I used and how I attached them

How I secured the base and attached the system to my house for a sturdy, safe display

Whether you’re just getting started or planning your own epic light show, I hope this helps!

💬 Got more questions? Drop them in the comments—happy to help!

LINK TO THE KRAKEN 1/2 METER FIREWORK STAR:
https://www.diylightguy.com/products/kraken-rigid-system-rigid-25-tube-starter-kit-%F0%9F%8E%87?variant=51043850518804

title: DIY Alert! Limited Mini Short Throw Projectors Available!
Turning my Animatronic Mini Songbird I built - into Disney's Haunted Mansion Raven - PART 2
description:
🦅 Follow My Project!
Now that I’ve built my animatronic bird, follow me on my journey as I transform it into the iconic Haunted Mansion Raven—complete with glowing red LED eyes and spooky flair inspired by Disney’s classic attraction.

🎥 Animatronic Mini Songbird Camp at Garner Holt Productions | SoCal Mini Lighting Enthusiasts Special Event 🐦🤖

I had the incredible opportunity to attend the Animatronic Mini Songbird Camp at Garner Holt Productions, hosted by the amazing team at Education Through Imagination. This immersive STEAM experience is usually a 4-day class, but it was specially condensed into just 8 hours for our SoCal Mini Lighting Enthusiasts Group—and what a day it was!

✨ About the Event:
Garner Holt generously opened his world-renowned animatronics facility in Redlands, California, giving us an exclusive look behind the scenes. We toured his working factory, participated in a hands-on animatronic build workshop, and learned directly from the pros. All proceeds from this event help support the Garner Holt Foundation.

🏗️ About Garner Holt & the Foundation:
Garner Holt started Garner Holt Productions, Inc. in his parents’ garage back in 1977 while still in high school. Today, his company has built more animatronics for theme parks than anyone else in the world, with clients like Disney, Universal Studios, Knott’s Berry Farm, and Chuck E. Cheese.

The Garner Holt Foundation is a dream fulfilled—created to give back to the community by offering immersive, hands-on learning experiences in science, technology, engineering, arts, and mathematics (STEAM). Their mission:
🔧 Increase hope
🎨 Ignite imagination
🚀 Inspire creativity

They focus especially on underserved youth, helping them explore careers in engineering, robotics, automation, visual & performing arts, and more—while building essential job skills and self-confidence.

🎬 Don’t miss this behind-the-scenes look at the future of animatronics—and the amazing impact this foundation is making!

👉 Like, comment, and subscribe for more behind-the-scenes DIY projects, custom animatronics, and STEAM adventures!

#disney #disneyhauntedmansion #hauntedmansion #halloween #halloweendecor #animatronichauntedmansionraven #diyanimatronicraven #animatronicraven #GarnerHolt #Animatronics #STEAMEducation #MiniSongbirdCamp #SoCalMiniLightingEnthusiasts #DIYAnimatronics #GarnerHoltFoundation #ThemeParkMagic #EngineeringFun #HauntedMansionRaven #CustomAnimatronic #HandsOnLearning #EducationThroughImagination

title: Bohemian Rhapsody Sung by Singing Pumpkins | Queen - No External Projector
description:
Here’s a throwback to one of my all-time favorite songs - Bohemian Rhapsody by Queen - brought to life in a whole new way! 🎃🎶

This project was a labor of love. There is NO external projector used in this project. Each pumpkin has it's own internal short throw projector hidden inside of it. These pumpkins can be placed anywhere and can be viewed from different angles without distortion.

I created custom - carved pumpkin faces to match different singing phonemes, designed animated mouth movements, and synced everything to Queen’s iconic track. Each of the 4 Mindscope 3D Jabbering Jack mini pumpkins plays a different part of the song, perfectly in sync with one another.

It took a lot of time, patience, and a bit of Halloween magic to pull it off, but I'm super proud of how it turned out. Hope you enjoy this musical Halloween tribute as much as I enjoyed creating it!

Items used:

4 Mindscope Jabbering Jack mini pumpkins

Custom Power Supply with 4 outputs, so the pumpkins turn on at the same time

Custom animation synced to vocals

Audio split & video-mapped per pumpkin

👻 Let me know what song I should try next in the comments!

🔖 Tags:
queen, bohemian rhapsody, bohemian rhapsody singing pumpkins, queen halloween show, jabbering jack pumpkins, animated pumpkins, halloween light show, queen bohemian rhapsody cover, halloween music light show, diy halloween decorations, pumpkin singing animation, halloween 2025 ideas, bohemian rhapsody halloween tribute, jabbering jack sync

#️⃣ Hashtags:
#BohemianRhapsody #Queen #HalloweenShow #SingingPumpkins #JabberingJack #HalloweenDIY #PumpkinAnimation #LightShow #DIYLightGuy

title: Disney Haunted Mansion Grim Grinning Ghosts – Animated Singing Pumpkins - No External Projector!
description:
Check out my latest project! I brought the Haunted Mansion's Grim Grinning Ghosts to life using carved pumpkin singing faces that I created — No External Projector needed!

I created carved pumpkin faces based on different phonemes and designed a singing face animation. Then I synced the legendary Disney Haunted Mansion “singing busts” audio to the animation and uploaded it to 5 Mindscope 3D Jabbering Jack mini pumpkins. Each Pumpkin has its own video file, based on the character on the pumpkin. It was a little tricky, but I got all 5 pumpkins to synchronize together!

This version features scary faces, but I’ll be testing traditional, funny, and mixed faces also to see which vibe works best. Let me know what you think—do you like spooky, classic, or silly?

👻🎵🎃

title: Do You Want to Build an Animated Snow Globe?
description:
🎄 DIY Animated Snow Globe – Full Plug-and-Play Kit! ❄️
Ready to create your own magical, animated snow globe? In this video, I’ll show you how to put together my latest DIY project — a fully customizable Mr. Chill Animated Snow Globe Video Head! I’ve done all the hard work for you, including:
✅ Drilling the base and tray for easy assembly
✅ Cutting an opening in the base and tray to allow all the custom wires from the Mr. Chill to pass through into the base
✅ Custom cable extensions for seamless connections
✅ Opening up the video head to run cables for power, volume, video skip, external speaker, and even data upload for future videos
✅ Providing a plug-and-play Mr. Chill Animated 3D Head, LED Light Controller, Rechargeable Battery pack, and External Speaker

✨ What’s Included in the Kit:

Plug-and-Play Mr. Chill animated 3D Head

14" Acrylic Globe with Custom 10" Opening

All required screws and nuts

Prepped base and tray for easy installation

Custom cables to connect the power, front circuit board, speaker, and projector

LED lights, Bluetooth LED Controller, and decorations to bring your snow globe to life!

👨‍🔧 Easy Assembly with Step-by-Step Tutorials

I'll be posting a series of videos showing you exactly how to:
👉 Assemble the base and tray
👉 Connect all the cables
👉 Install the LED lights and battery pack
👉 Add decorations and finish your masterpiece

🎅 Bonus Feature: Upload your own videos to the projector, including an AI-generated Santa message for your kids! I included a sample video I created for my two Grandsons in the video

🔗 Get Your Kit Here: www.diylightguy.com

👍 Don’t forget to like, comment, and subscribe to stay updated on future DIY projects!
